text: Hey. I'm really sorry I've been quiet lately but I've been super busy. Things are calming down now.

To answer your question. The more detail you can add the better. When we are modelling here to photoscans or photo reference, when we present to the supervisors they will be zooming in and looking at every single detail and calling out missing parts.

The more you can match the reference the better for the reel, it shows a meticulous attention to detail which we are always striving for
